com.netflix.genie.web.tasks.job

Class JobMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.tasks.GenieTask
      • com.netflix.genie.web.tasks.node.NodeTask
        • com.netflix.genie.web.tasks.job.JobMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class JobMonitor
extends NodeTask
    Given a process id this class will check if the job client process is running or not.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Method Summary

      Get the type of scheduling mechanism which should be used to schedule this task.

      Get the Trigger which this task should be scheduled with.
      void run()
      This will check the process identified by the pid supplied to the constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        This will check the process identified by the pid supplied to the constructor. If the pid no longer exists fires an event to the system saying the job is done.
